message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statement, the carrying amount of inventories sold is typically reported as "Cost of Goods Sold" in the income statement, as this represents the cost of inventory items that were sold to customers during the period.

From the income statement provided, I can see:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 504930.00 | 2024-02-03 |

This line item represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '504930.00'} }
```
